personal_info.name: Mahmoud Zanoon
personal_info.brief: A mobile developer passionate about building seamless, accessible and user-friendly mobile apps(Android, iOS).

featured_projects.subtitle: Here are some of the selected projects that showcase my passion for Mobile Application development.

my_projects.subtitle: Clothes brand (E-Commerce)
my_projects.description:
E-Commerce App for selling women clothes online.
• Home screen displays different collections of products and brands.
• Cart, Favourites and  Search product.
• Checkout cash, wallet, payment gateways and refund.
• Product details, Order history and Delivery.
• Authentication and Categories.
• Sorting and Filteration.
• Localization, Notification And more...

my_projects.subtitle: online legal service
my_projects.description:
Tqneen is online legal service provides and facilitates finding legal consultations online at low fees.
• Easily by booking an online session and choosing between the best qualified lawyers specialized in different fields who can provide reliable and professional advice that guarantees all your legal rights
• It also allows clients to view lawyers' files and qualifications in addition to their previous ratings and reviews.

my_projects.subtitle: online legal service (lawyers)
my_projects.description:
gives experts the ability to manage consultations with new clients, and simple communication.
 It's like a freelancing for lawyers.
• Receiving consultation requests from clients.
• Accepting or rejecting consultation requestsEasy communication between lawyers and clients.
• Consultation log.

my_projects.subtitle: Car wash service App
my_projects.description:
Car wash service for users through many packages provided at the customer's location.
• The customer specifies the place and time of the wash.
 There are many sizes and types of vehicles that can be chosen.
• Payment is in cash or online.
• Customers can be supported through the contacts available in the application.

my_projects.subtitle: Service Provider for user app
my_projects.description:
The service provider who performs laundry through requests or a map.
• Washer washes auto assigned requests.
• Washer takes pictures of the vehicle before and after washing.
• Washer can only start washing through the application within 300 meters of the customer's location.

application to provide loans based on known reasons in KSA.

my_projects.subtitle: islamic app
my_projects.description: provide audio, video, books material for it's quran app

experiences.job_experience: In Pan Arab Media, I reached a professional level I had never achieved before, specializing in e-commerce projects and working with very famous brands and larger-scale projects. This can be seen through the following applications: Tiamo, Aziz, Dice, and Sahla.

In smart gate I completed numerous projects at this company, such as developing an application for clinics and a dashboard for the same application. I also worked on a restaurant management project consisting of seven applications called Ristecho and a financial services project called Cascade.

At Startup defenders, I worked on many projects, such as Sabouna and Taqneen, and acquired new skills. I worked on an application outside the Egyptian market and learned many new programming concepts. There were many challenges that my team and I successfully overcame.

I joined Algoriza which is very large company as intern where I acquired many skills, such as writing clean code, using clean architecture, and executing many projects both individually and within a team. I enhanced my existing skills over these four months, taking my expertise to the next level.

I greatly benefited from freelance work as it required direct interaction with clients, which gave me significant experience in life and work. The competition in this field is extremely high, requiring you to provide the best service at the lowest cost, which is very challenging Especially when working as an individual.

I worked at Medad while I was a university student and continued working for a few months after graduation. I primarily focused on developing it's quran app. Although it was challenging as it's my first project with first company, I managed to accomplish it with my teammates. During this period, I learned a lot practically by developing my first real app in the market and uploading it to the Play Store. I also learned how to balance work and study time and work within a team.

education.degree: Bachelor in Computer Science and Engineering

about_me.title: I'm Mahmoud Fathi Zanoon, I'm experienced flutter developer, Versatile project expertise, with strong educational background and excellent soft skills
about_me.subtitle: With over 3 years of hands-on experience in Flutter development, I have successfully created numerous applications that are live on the app store and play store, contributing to business growth and innovation. My portfolio includes high-scale projects across various domains, including e-commerce. I have had the privilege of working on a diverse range of projects, from small-scale apps to complex, high-traffic platforms, equipping me with the ability to tackle different challenges and deliver solutions that meet and exceed expectations. Holding a degree in Software Engineering from the Faculty of Engineering, Computer Science Department, I possess a solid understanding of software development principles and best practices. Beyond my technical abilities, my strong soft skills enable me to effectively communicate and collaborate with a wide range of stakeholders, making me adept at handling all types of people and situations.

capabilities.subtitle: I'm passionate about continuously expanding my skill set, driven by curiosity and a love for learning. Embracing new challenges excites me, fueling my growth and adaptability. With every opportunity, I strive to enhance my expertise and contribute more effectively.
